email_confirmation_email.subject: Webbase Email Account Confirmation
email_confirmation_email.html: Please click here to confirm your email account
email_confirmation_email.text: Please click here to confirm your email account: https://domain.com/confirm-email/{email_validation_token}

reset_password_email.subject: Webbase Reset Password
reset_password_email.text: Please click here to reset your password: http://192.168.1.5:8080/forgottenpassword?resetPasswordToken={reset_password_token}
